duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and prepare materials for Board of Directors meetings and departmental communications and legal matters.
Handle confidential information and maintain confidentiality.
Assist in the preparation of external communications, including newsletters, email blasts, scripts, and presentations.
Take accurate meeting minutes for Board meetings and prepare follow-up meeting summaries.
Manage the preparation of benefits and appeals materials for the Board of Directors.
Serve as liaison with the Board of Directors and assist with other required external communications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience; Paralegal certificate a plus
